description:
[h1][url=https://www.youtube.com/ScrapMechanicMods][img]https://scrapmechanicmods.com/src/assets/img/smm_bearing_32.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/ScrapMechanicMods]Scrap Mechanic Mods[/url]: [b]The Modpack[/b] 0.4.x[/h1]
This is the main Modpack and contains many of the most common parts.
Now updated to work in 0.4 creative mode!
The team will be moving onto other mods now, and perhaps some new survival mods ğŸ˜®
